def transform(sequence):
    first_zero = sequence.find('0')
    last_zero = sequence.rfind('0')
    return sequence[:first_zero] + '7'*(last_zero - first_zero + 1) + sequence[last_zero + 1:]

def transform(sequence):
    first_zero = sequence.find('0')
    last_zero = sequence.rfind('0')
    return sequence[:first_zero] + '7'*(last_zero - first_zero + 1) + sequence[last_zero + 1:].

def transform(sequence):
    first_zero = sequence.find('0')
    last_zero = sequence.rfind('0')
    return sequence[:first_zero] + '7'*(last_zero - first_zero + 1) + sequence[last_zero + 1:]
